titleStmt.title: A true relation of a late skirmish at Henley upon Thames: wherein a great defeat was given to the Redding Cavaliers, lately assaulting the aforesaid towne of Henley. Being the true copy of a letter sent from one Captaine Samuel Turner, then in the said service, to his brother in London.
titleStmt.author: Turner, Samuel, d. 1647?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Henry Overton, and are to be sold at his Shop in Popes-Head-Alley,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
